title: What are the best Illuminati conspiracy YouTube channels? - Quora

response.answer_text: The film compilation produced by Flyby News in 2012 called Dark Legacy - JFK and 9–11 have clips on the most revealing conspiracies in our time. The name of the shadow government is lurking in the shadows.. Know them by their deeds.. Part 1 - running time - 0:59:00 (Sept. 11, Star Trek, Lyn Margulis, Wellstone)  Part 2 - running time - 1:28:00(JFK, Fed. Reserve, Lunar Lunacy, Democracy)  Condensed Version - 58 minutes - Online Film (Order of subjects of parts 1 and 2 reversed)  FN's Youtube Channel - Jonathan Mark
The RAW Archive - RAWarchive Also Adam Curtis’s Documentaries are Unparalleled if you want to understand the world without resorting to conspiracy theories.
